spell.name: Worm's Repast
entries: Gnawing worms materialize within the flesh of the target creature, dealing {@damage 4d6} piercing damage and {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent piercing damage}. If the target is a non-skeletal corporeal undead creature, you deal an extra {@damage 2d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent piercing damage}. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

entries.Critical Success: The worms writhe away harmlessly and the target takes no damage.
entries.Success: The target takes full initial damage but no {@condition persistent damage}, and the spell ends immediately.
entries.Failure: The target takes full initial and {@condition persistent damage} and is {@condition flat-footed} due to the pain for as long as it takes {@condition persistent damage}.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the target takes double the initial damage and is also {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} by the pain for as long as it takes {@condition persistent damage}.

2: : The initial and {@condition persistent damage} increase by {@dice 2d6} and {@dice 1d6}, respectively.
